abstract.t: EAP is a lower layer dependant protocol that has 802.1X and PANA tocarry it over link layer and network layer respectively. 802.1Xcannot go through any nodes, while PANA can carry EAP through thenetwork over network layer. 802.1X is popular on legacy terminals,but it is painful to upgrade all these terminals to support PANA.This document introduces a PANA interworking function that enableslegacy 802.1X terminals get authentication and access to PANA networkwithout upgrading its software or hardware.
